metadata.title: CVE-2022-39831 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in PSPP 1.6.2. There is a heap-based bufferoverflow at the function read_bytes_internal in utilities/pspp-dump-sav.c,which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact. This issue is different fromCVE-2018-20230.

criterions.comment: pspp package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
